title: Unsung heroes: Antri Christoforou on being the odd one out, life as a bike mom, taking her own path
content:
The 31-year-old from Cyprus took a winding path to professional cycling but she finally made it to the WorldTour last year.

Read the full article at Unsung heroes: Antri Christoforou on being the odd one out, life as a bike mom, taking her own path on Velo.
author: sadhbhoshea
